snippet.title: Dave & Buster's | Tomb Raider | Play 4 Adventurous Games Free
snippet.description:
Tomb Raider is coming to theaters and to Dave & Buster’s! More action-packed than ever, become the Tomb Raider right here with the new Tomb Raider Arcade game – you can’t play it anywhere else! Your quest for fun continues – play 4 of our most adventurous games for FREE*, including Tomb Raider. Fuel up with bold flavors and then get back to the action. Play Four Games free including our new Tomb Raider arcade game – Only at Dave & Buster’s. See Tomb Raider in theaters March 16th. 

Learn More: https://www.daveandbusters.com/tomb-raider

*Offer valid with same day $10 Power Card® purchase or reload and expires by end of the day. Offer valid through 3/18/18. Offer subject to change. Limit one offer per person, per Power Card, per day. Valid at participating stores only. Games may vary by location. See store for details.

© 2018 WBEI & MGM. TM Square Enix
